sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './HeatMap.css'; // We'll create this CSS file const HeatMap = () => { const [selectedZone, setSelectedZone] = useState(null); const [animationActive, setAnimationActive] = useState(true); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('density'); // density, risk, activity // Enhanced tourist data with realistic coordinates and intensity const touristZones = [ { id: 'zone-1', name: 'Delhi Central', tourists: 45, intensity: 0.9, risk: 'low', coordinates: { x: 15, y: 25 }, radius: 80, details: { active: 42, offline: 2, alerts: 1 } }, { id: 'zone-2', name: 'Mumbai Gateway', tourists: 38, intensity: 0.8, risk: 'medium', coordinates: { x: 8, y: 50 }, radius: 70, details: { active: 35, offline: 2, alerts: 1 } }, { id: 'zone-3', name: 'Goa Beaches', tourists: 28, intensity: 0.7, risk: 'low', coordinates: { x: 6, y: 65 }, radius: 60, details: { active: 26, offline: 1, alerts: 1 } }, { id: 'zone-4', name: 'Rajasthan Heritage', tourists: 22, intensity: 0.6, risk: 'medium', coordinates: { x: 12, y: 35 }, radius: 50, details: { active: 20, offline: 1, alerts: 1 } }, { id: 'zone-5', name: 'Kerala Backwaters', tourists: 18, intensity: 0.5, risk: 'low', coordinates: { x: 10, y: 75 }, radius: 45, details: { active: 17, offline: 1, alerts: 0 } }, { id: 'zone-6', name: 'Himachal Hills', tourists: 15, intensity: 0.4, risk: 'high', coordinates: { x: 18, y: 15 }, radius: 40, details: { active: 13, offline: 1, alerts: 1 } }, { id: 'zone-7', name: 'Tamil Nadu Temples', tourists: 12, intensity: 0.3, risk: 'low', coordinates: { x: 15, y: 80 }, radius: 35, details: { active: 12, offline: 0, alerts: 0 } }, { id: 'zone-8', name: 'Assam Tea Gardens', tourists: 8, intensity: 0.2, risk: 'medium', coordinates: { x: 45, y: 20 }, radius: 30, details: { active: 7, offline: 1, alerts: 0 } } ]; // Scatter individual tourist dots for more realism const individualTourists = Array.from({ length: 35 }, (_, i) => ({ id: `tourist-${i}`, x: Math.random() * 90 + 5, y: Math.random() * 80 + 10, intensity: Math.random() * 0.6 + 0.2, status: ['active', 'offline', 'alert'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)] })); const getIntensityColor = (intensity, mode = 'density') => { if (mode === 'risk') { if (intensity > 0.7) return '#ff4757'; // High risk - Red if (intensity > 0.4) return '#ffa502'; // Medium risk - Orange return '#2ed573'; // Low risk - Green } if (mode === 'activity') { if (intensity > 0.7) return '#3742fa'; // High activity - Blue if (intensity > 0.4) return '#5352ed'; // Medium activity - Purple return '#70a1ff'; // Low activity - Light Blue } // Default density mode - Heat colors if (intensity > 0.8) return '#ff3838'; if (intensity > 0.6) return '#ff6b35'; if (intensity > 0.4) return '#f7931e'; if (intensity > 0.2) return '#ffb700'; return '#2ecc71'; }; const handleZoneClick = (zone) => { setSelectedZone(zone); }; const getTotalStats = () => { return touristZones.reduce((acc, zone) => ({ total: acc.total + zone.tourists, active: acc.active + zone.details.active, offline: acc.offline + zone.details.offline, alerts: acc.alerts + zone.details.alerts }), { total: 0, active: 0, offline: 0, alerts: 0 }); }; const stats = getTotalStats(); return (

Real-time tourist distribution across major destinations

handleZoneClick(zone)} >

))} {/* Individual tourist dots */} {individualTourists.map((tourist) => (
))}

)}

); }; export default HeatMap;
